channel.title: Network Device Interface on Ying-Shan Chen@TW ~ $

item.title: Open Sound Control Control Light by music real-time
item.description: During the time I become an technical art intern in Moonshine Studio which is one of the biggest animation company in Taiwan, I cooperate with many people whose backgrounds are totally very different from me. In the company, the artists made original 2D or 3D animations, motion design, post-production for movies or dramas, such like dynamic simulation, FBX…, interactive media, and also research and design new technique, such like AI, which is useful in the pipeline of any products. However, I act as intern in a special team which combine realistic and virtualistic to implement virtual production in MoonShine XR studio. They are the first company that introduced virtual production in Taiwan.
